name: Michael Howell From Capital Wars
title: Prospects For A Puzzling 2025 2
text:
Synopsis
Global economic conditions are showing signs of strain, with potential implications for monetary policy and market liquidity driven by US Federal Reserve actions and changing economic dynamics.

Key Insights
- World GDP growth has experienced a significant decline through December, based on an AI-based daily estimation model
- There are indications of tightening Chinese liquidity
- The US is experiencing a potential fade-out of hidden stimulus measures following the recent election
- The newsletter suggests ongoing analysis of economic conditions for 2025, with a focus on US Fed and Treasury actions
- The potential impact on Global Liquidity is a key area of investigation
